user_question: What are the top 5 most memorable goals in World Cup history and generate an image of one of them?
final_answer: The top 5 most memorable goals in World Cup history include: 1) Diego Maradona's 'Hand of God' goal in 1986, 2) Pelé's goal in the 1958 final, 3) Geoff Hurst's hat-trick goal in 1966, 4) Dennis Bergkamp's goal against Argentina in 1998, 5) James Rodriguez's volley in 2014. Image of Diego Maradona's 'Hand of God' goal generated. Maradona's 'Hand of God' goal occurred during the 1986 World Cup quarter-final match between Argentina and England. Maradona used his hand to punch the ball into the net, which was not seen by the referee, leading to a controversial goal.
